sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'

import {
    Box,
    Square,
    Flex,
    Stack,
    Heading,
    Text,
    Container,
    Input,
    Button,
    SimpleGrid,
    Avatar,
    AvatarGroup,
    useBreakpointValue,
    IconProps,
    Icon,
    Center
  } from '@chakra-ui/react';
import { Stepper } from './Stepper';
  
  
  
  export default function Form() {
    return (
    <Center>
        <Stack spacing={3} w='50%'>
            <Text fontSize='6xl' textAlign='center'>varied intake weight loss calculator</Text>
            <Text fontSize='4xl' textAlign='center'>life is ever changing. why isn't your diet?</Text>
            <Stepper weightloss='3' unit='kg' dietLength='10' />
        </Stack>
    </Center>
    );
  }
